altTitles.vi: Khoảnh khắc bé nhỏ của Ichika

description.en:
In the spring of her second year of high school, Sendawara Ichika was told by her doctor that she had two years left to live. Three years later, now in her second year of university, Ichika spends her days not knowing when the end will come.

One day, by chance, she is reunited with Yurugi Akifumi -- her former philosophy professor, who quit the university. Once in love with Yurugi-sensei, Ichika has her feelings rekindled upon meeting him again, but...

A story of the fleeting love between Ichika, whose life is growing shorter, and a man quietly trying to disappear.
description.vi:
Mùa xuân lớp 11 đó, Sendawara Ichika được chẩn đoán chỉ còn 2 năm để sống. 3 năm sau, khi trở thành sinh viên đại học năm hai, Ichika vẫn tiếp tục sống những ngày tháng hối hả, bận rộn, nhưng lại không bao giờ biết được đâu sẽ là hồi kết.

Mọi thứ đổi thay khi cô gặp Thầy Yurugi Akifumi. Lần đầu tiên, cô có thể cảm thấy mình còn sống như vậy vì điều gì.  Và rồi Thầy Yurugi lại không còn tới trường nữa, Ichika bị bỏ lại với ngàn câu hỏi trong lòng...

Câu chuyện về tình yêu bé nhỏ thoáng qua của một Ichika có cuộc sống ngày càng ngắn ngủi và một người Thầy muốn lặng lẽ biến mất khỏi nhân gian.
description.pt-br:
Na primavera de seu segundo ano do ensino médio, Sendawara Ichika foi informada por seu médico que ela tinha dois anos de vida. Três anos depois, agora em seu segundo ano de universidade, Ichika passa seus dias sem saber quando chegará o fim. 

Um dia, por acaso, ela se reencontra com Yurugi Akifumi – seu ex-professor de filosofia, que deixou a universidade. Uma vez apaixonada por Yurugi-sensei, Ichika reacendeu seus sentimentos ao encontrá-lo novamente, mas… 

Uma história de amor fugaz entre Ichika, cuja vida está ficando cada vez mais curta, e um homem silenciosamente tentando desaparecer.

description.en:
Yeoju is a second-rate author living a mediocre existence in modern-day Korea. A tragic accident lands her in the plot of a bestselling martial arts novel and she wakes up as the infamous villainess Haewon Tang. Hoping to save herself from a gruesome death, Yeoju must figure out who to trust, harness Haewon’s inner chi, and learn martial arts as she fights to save the Sichuan Tang Clan. Can she change the outcome of the novel and prove she’s the worthy hero?

---
Our main character was an unsuccessful romance fantasy novelist when she gets into a hit-and-run then wakes up as the villainess in a best-selling martial arts novel. She uses the information from the novel that she had analyzed in her original life, in order to avoid her death-ending and finding the truth behind what had really happened to her.

Notre personnage principal était une romancière de romans fantastiques sans succès lorsqu'elle a été victime d'un délit de fuite et s'est réveillée en tant que la méchante dans un roman d'arts martiaux à succès. Elle utilise les informations du roman qu'elle avait analysées dans sa vie d'origine, afin d'éviter sa mort et de découvrir la vérité sur ce qui lui est réellement arrivée.

description.hu:
Főszereplőnk egy sikertelen romantikus regényíró, aki autóbalesetet szenved és egy másik világban tér magához. Abban a világban, amiről nemrég olvasott. Méghozzá a regény gonosztevőjeként, aki elnyerve méltó büntetését a végén meghal. Csakhogy főszereplőnknek esze ágában sincs meghalni, helyette kiaknázza a sztori ismeretében és saját harcművészeti tudásában rejlő lehetőségeket.

description.id:
Seorang penulis novel romansa fantasi mengalami kecelakaan tabrak lari, tapi begitu sadar kembali, ia menyadari dirinya jadi Dang Haewon, pemeran pembantu dalam novel yang pernah ia baca. Namun, Dang Haewon adalah tokoh jahat dan kejam yang mencoba membunuh pemeran utama wanita demi mendapatkan pemeran utama pria hingga mengakibatkan dirinya terbunuh. Tidak mau nasibnya berakhir seperti itu, si penulis pun memanfaatkan semua informasi yang didapatkannya sewaktu membaca novel itu. Akankah dia berhasil mengubah nasibnya dan jadi tokoh terkuat di novel itu?

description.it:
Un'autrice di secondo ordine, Yeoju, si ritrova all'interno della trama di un bestseller wuxia, rivestendo i panni della famosa e spietata Haewon Tang. Nella speranza di fuggire da una morte orribile, Yeoju imparerà a utilizzare le arti marziali e a combattere per l'incolumità del Clan Sichuan Tang. Saprà volgere a suo favore la trama del romanzo dimostrando di essere una degna eroina?

description.ja:
現代でロマンスファンタジー作家をしていたはずなのに……　 「南宮世家の若当主」を読んで武侠系の小説家に転向しようとしていた矢先、交通事故に遭って小説の世界に異世界トリップ…！？ しかもそこでの私は最強の悪女”唐海苑”！ 唐海苑が死ぬという物語の結末を知っている私が、このままみすみす犬死するわけにはいかないでしょ！ 未来はこの手で変えてみせる…！

description.ko:
"하필이면 주인공도 아니고,
소설 속 제일가는 악녀라니…"

월세 탈출을 위해 읽기 시작한 무협 소설 『남궁세가 소가주』
그중 최고 악녀 당해원으로 빙의하게 된다.

흠모하던 남자를 얻기 위해
남자의 정인에게 독약을 먹이고,
무림의 고수들을 이간질하고,
마교의 앞잡이가 되어 강호를 혼란에 빠뜨리는
…세계관 최고 악녀, 당해원.

"소설처럼 이렇게 당할 순 없어...!!"

우연히 삼킨 만년삼으로 인해
세계관 최강자가 되어버린
무협 소설 속 최고 악녀 "당해원"의 갱생기!

description.pl:
Nasza główna bohaterka była marną powieściopisarką romansów fantasy, aż pewnego dnia została potrącona w wypadku i obudziła się jako czarny charakter w bestsellerowej powieści o sztukach walki. Wykorzystuje informacje z powieści, które przeanalizowała w swoim pierwotnym życiu, aby uniknąć śmierci i odkryć prawdę o tym, co tak naprawdę się z nią stało.

description.ru:
Наша главная героиня была несостоявшейся писательницей фантастических романов, но когда ее сбивает машина, она просыпается злодейкой в романе-бестселлере боевых искусств. Она использует информацию из книги, которую она проанализировала в своей настоящей жизни, чтобы избежать смерти и найти правду о том, что же случилось с ней на самом деле.

description.th:
ตัวเอกก็ไม่ใช่ แต่มาเป็นตัวร้ายที่ร้ายที่สุดในนิยายเนี่ยนะ…' 
เมื่อนักเขียนอย่างฉันอยากจะลองเปลี่ยนสไตล์การเขียน จึงเริ่มต้นอ่านนิยายกำลังภายในเรื่อง 『นายน้อยแห่งตระกูลนัมกุง』 และเพราะอุบัติเหตุ จู่ๆ ก็ดันได้เข้ามาสิงอยู่ในร่างของทังแฮวอน วายร้ายในนิยายเรื่องนั้นซะได้
เธอร้ายถึงขนาดที่วางยาพิษหญิงสาวผู้เป็นที่รักของชายหนุ่มที่นางรัก แถมยังยุยงให้เหล่าชาวยุทธ์ในยุทธจักรแตกคอกันอีก เท่านั้นยังไม่พอ นางยังทำให้คนของลัทธิปีศาจเข้ามาสร้างความวุ่นวายในยุทธภพอีกด้วย
แต่ฉันจะไม่ยอมมีจุดจบแบบทังแฮวอนในนิยายหรอกนะ ฉันจะมีชีวิตใหม่ ด้วยการเป็นวายร้ายที่แข็งแกร่งที่สุดให้ดู!

Ana karakterimiz başarısız bir romantik fantezi romanı yazarıydı ve bir vur-kaç olayından sonra, çok satan bir dövüş sanatları romanındaki kötü adam olarak uyandı. description.zh-hk:
「不但不是主角，還偏偏是書裡最惡毒的女人...」

為了擺脫租屋生活
而開始閱讀武俠小說《南宮世家少主》，
卻穿越成為了小說裡最惡毒的女人——唐海媛。

唐海媛這個天下第一惡女為了得到欽慕的男人，
不惜毒殺思慕之人的情人、挑撥武林高手們、
成為魔教的走狗並導致武林動盪。

「絕不能和原本的故事內容一樣，白白送死!!」

偶然吃了萬年參而變成小說世界裡的最強者，
武俠小說最強惡女「唐海媛」的重生記!

description.en: Mimori Touka has always been something of a background character in his high school. So when he and his classmates are summoned to a fantasy land and gifted with incredible skills, it seems like the perfect opportunity to make a name for himself. The only problem? Mimori’s skills are abysmal at best, and he’s banished to a deadly dungeon. But as he begins to test these new abilities, he discovers just how powerful he’s become. Can Mimori fight his way back to exact revenge?!
description.ja:
学校では“空気モブ”な高校生・三森灯火は、クラスメイトとともに勇者として異世界に召喚された。しかし、次々と周りがＳ級やＡ級の才覚を見出される中、〝廃棄対象〟となるＥ級の才能しかないと宣告されてしまう。救済を求める彼にクラスメイトが向けたのは蔑みの眼差しで……。そして、召喚主の女神ヴィシスにより生存者ゼロの遺跡に廃棄される。絶望に満ちた奈落の底で煮えたぎる復讐心を抱えた少年は、ハズレ枠と誹られた【状態異常スキル】で魔物を蹂躙する！

「何をしても生き残る――クソ女神に一発くれてやるまでは」
description.pt:
Durante a viagem escolar Touka e seus colegas são convocados para outro mundo. No entanto, Touka foi o único com a classificação mais baixa: Rank-E - um status extremamente baixo em comparação com seus colegas de classe. Assim, o personagem secundário e herói abandonado, se tornara o mais forte à medida que avança e contra-ataca.


---
description.vi: Mimori Touka - Một học sinh cao trung với lối sống “quần chúng không khí”. Trong chuyến học dã ngoại của trường, Touka và các bạn cùng lớp bất ngờ bị Nữ Thần triệu hồi đến dị giới. Quá trình đánh giá năng lực theo hạng S, A, B, C, D đã được tiến hành và chuyện hiếm thấy là lần triệu hồi này quá nhiều người hùng cấp S tối thượng với cấp A ưu tú cùng quy tụ. Thêm vào đó, chỉ duy nhất Touka xếp hạng yếu kém - Người hùng cấp E có chỉ số trạng thái siêu thấp so với các bạn cùng lớp. Chưa kể kỹ năng cá nhân [Trạng Thái Dị Thường] của Touka còn vượt xa cái mốc thất bại toàn tập nơi dị giới khiến cậu bị “loại bỏ”. Trải qua bao thăng trầm đấu tranh giành giật sự sống, cậu quyết tâm trở thành ác quỷ để bắt đầu hành trình báo thù Nữ Thần.
description.pt-br: Durante a viagem escolar, Touka e seus colegas são convocados para outro mundo. No entanto, Touka foi o único com a classificação mais baixa: Rank E – um status extremamente baixo comparado a seus colegas de classe. Assim, o herói abandonado se tornará absolutamente o demônio mais forte à medida que avança e contra-ataca.

description.en:
“I’ve clearly told you—I’m just an ordinary B0-class guide.” With a top-tier dual bloodline ability, Lee Yeoni lives and works in the countryside, keeping his looks and skills a secret. However, due to certain circumstances, he’s reassigned to the capital and becomes entangled with Tae Hajin, an S+ level esper. This sets off an unspoken power struggle between them.
Tae Hajin, who is suspicious of Lee Yeoni, senses he’s concealing something and is intent on uncovering the truth. Lee Yeoni tries to thwart Tae Hajin’s efforts to expose him, but it proves challenging. To protect himself, he decides to use Tae Hajin as a shield and takes on the role of his personal guide.

Saeki is an ordinary high school boy with a girlfriend, Sara, who is the heiress of the Saionji Group, and whose beauty and intelligence are the envy of everyone.

Sara seems like a prim and proper young lady to other people, but the two share a secret! Because of the secret, Saeki can't fully commit, but Sara prepares lunch for him, she hugs him to deepen their relationship, and she acts like she's trying to seduce Saeki to corrupt him!!!?

What is the secret of their relationship and what is Sara's true purpose…!!? A love comedy about a young lady disguising herself, and a boy in an enviable situation!

(Source: ComicWalker)

Based on the ero doujinshi by the author.

---

**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Nico Nico Seiga](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/67455)
description.ja:
誰もが羨む美貌と知性を持つ、西園寺グループのお嬢様・紗良…を彼女に持つ冴えない男子高校生・佐伯。

他人にはクール＆ツンしか見せない絶対零度のお嬢様な紗良と仲睦まじい関係を築いているが、実は二人にはある秘密があった!!
そんな秘密を抱えているのもあり、中々踏み出せない佐伯をよそに、紗良は彼のためにお弁当を用意したり、関係を深めるために抱きしめ合ったり、佐伯を堕とそうとするようなアプローチをしかけてくる!!!?

二人の恋人関係の秘密とはいったい、そして紗良の目的とは…!!? お嬢様との羨ましすぎる、複雑Hな偽装ラブコメ!!!!

title.en: The Artistic Genius of Music Is the Reincarnation of Paganini

altTitles.en: High School Musical Genius Is Paganini Reincarnated

description.en: The Rebirth of Paganini, Joo-won Moon. He was once a gifted violinist, but due to an injury, he gradually distanced himself from music and lived the life of a regular high school student. “I don’t pursue music.” However, perhaps the irony of fate… Joo-won Moon accidentally transferred to the music class of an arts high school, he picked up the violin… Will Joo-won Moon be able to overcome his psychological trauma? And is there a chance for him to be reborn as a true violinist?

I'll Become a Villainess Who Will Go Down in History: The More Villainous I Become, the More the Prince Dotes on Me

description.en:
"I don't want a world full of only pretty things! I'll become a villainess who will go down in history!!"

For someone who hates a typical "good girl" heroine, I was reincarnated as my favorite otome-game villainess! Since my wish has been granted, I'll be the number one villainess who will go down in history! For that to happen, I need to be strong and intelligent! Also, although I'm just... doing my best, the more of a villainess I become, the more I'm liked by the Prince?! Can I really go down in history―?!
description.id:
"Aku tidak butuh dunia yang dipenuhi oleh keindahan! Yang kuinginkan hanyalah menjadi seorang villainess yang akan dikenang dalam sejarah!!".
Sebagai seseorang yang sangat membeci tipikal heroine yang "baik hati", Aku telah bereinkarnasi sebagai seorang villainess didalam game otome favoritku!, karena keinginanku telah terkabulkan, maka aku akan berusaha untuk menjadi seorang villainess nomer satu yang akan dikenang dalam sejarah!.
Agar hal itu bisa terjadi, maka aku haruslah kuat dan juga cerdas!
Tapi walau aku sudah berusaha keras untuk menjadi vilainess yang kuinginkan... Entah kenapa sang pangeran malah semakin tertarik kepadaku?! Kira-kira bisa tidak ya aku menjadi seorang villainess yang dikenang dalam sejarah....

altTitles.fr: Héros ? Ça fait longtemps que j'ai arrêté

altTitles.zh-ro: Ying xiong? Wo zao jiu bu dang liao

altTitles.ru: Герой? Я давно перестал им быть

altTitles.en: Hero? I Quit a Long Time Ago

description.en:
Zero was mankind’s first real superhero. Under his watch, countless other superheros appeared and followed in his footsteps. However, after 5 years of war, Zero disappeared without a trace.


---

**Note:** this is not your usual Chinese manhua, please read them from right to left (similar to Japanese format).

**Links:**
- [KuaiKan](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/1002/)
description.it: Zero fu il primo supereroe della razza umana. Sotto la sua guida, innumerevoli supereroi comparvero e crebbero seguendo le sue orme. Tuttavia, dopo cinque anni di guerra, Zero scomparve senza lasciare traccia. (*si legge da destra a sinistra, come i manga*).
description.pl: Zero był pierwszym prawdziwym superbohaterem ludzkości. Podczas jego aktywności pojawili się niezliczeni nowi bohaterowie, którzy podążyli jego ślady. Jednakże, po 5 latach walki, Zero zniknął bez śladu.

altTitles.zh: 神乎其技 - 特效化妝師

description.en: Kohei Nagase is an prodigy special effects artist. He and pro stuntman, Shingo Kannazuki, form Studio Gimmick. Together, they help people in need of Studio Gimmick's exceptional services. These people's problems are often able to be solved with Kohei's stunning special effects skills.

title.en: Haha to iu Jubaku Musume to iu Rougoku

altTitles.ja-ro: 母という呪縛 娘という牢獄

altTitles.vi: Lời nguyền của mẹ - Ngục tù của con

description.vi:
Đây là một câu chuyện dựa trên sự việc có thật.
Một th... th... với đầu và tứ chi bị ch.t đ.ứ.t l.ì.a được phát hiện thấy bên bờ sông. Sau khi điều tra, cảnh sát đã xác minh danh tính nạn nhân là Miyagawa Yaeko, thế nhưng rúng động hơn, hung thủ gây ra vụ án dã man này không ai khác chính là Miyagawa Hikari, con gái của bị hại.
Được biết suốt thời gian qua, Miyagawa Hikari đã liên tục bị mẹ ép học hành quá mức, và đã thi trượt vào Đại học Y đến 9 lần. Thế nhưng, mẹ cô lại không hề có ý định dừng lại. Và rồi, chuyện gì đến cũng sẽ phải đến...

altTitles.ja: 恋は双子で割り切れない

description.en:
My family moved next door to the Jinguji family when I was six years old. From then until I was in the first grade of high school now, both parents were on good terms, and the twin sisters of the Jinguji family that I grew up with were my close friends as if they were like my own family. Ryumi, the sister who looks like a boy, and Naori, the otaku sister who is cute on the outside. 

And I'm Jun Shirasaki, who isn't afraid of being sandwiched between beautiful sisters with different personalities. Although I'm a novice in love, I don't have a special relationship and the changes continue. "Why don't you go out with me? How about we try dating?" These words from Ryumi eventually led us into a strange love triangle.
description.id:
Keluargaku pindah ke sebelah keluarga Jinguji saat aku berusia enam tahun. Sejak saat itu sampai aku kelas satu SMA sekarang, kedua orang tua berhubungan baik, dan Saudari kembar keluarga jinguji yang tumbuh bersamaku merupakan teman dekatku seolah-olah mereka sudah seperti keluargaku sendiri.

Ryumi, saudari perempuan yang berpenampilan seperti laki-laki, dan Naori, saudari otaku yang memiliki sifat imut di luar. Dan Aku Jun Shirasaki, yang tidak takut terjepit di antara saudari perempuan cantik dengan kepribadian yang berbeda. Meskipun aku pemula dalma cinta, aku tak memiliki hubungan khusus dan perubahan terus berlanjut.

“Kenapa kau tidak pacaran denganku? Bagaimana kalau kita coba pacaran?”

Kata-Kata dari Ryumi ini akhirnya membawa kami ke cinta segitiga yang aneh.

Kisah komedi romantis cinta pertama dengan si kembar dimulai!
description.ja: 白崎純の隣の家には、神宮寺琉実と那織という双子の姉妹が住んでいる。ずっと仲の良い幼なじみでいられると思っていた。純が琉実に告白されるその時までは。そして、琉実が純を振ったその時からは―――。
description.pt-br: Minha família se mudou para a casa vizinha da família Jinguji quando eu tinha seis anos. Desde então, até eu estar na primeira série do ensino médio, ambos os pais se davam bem, e as irmãs gêmeas da família Jinguji com quem cresci eram minhas amigas íntimas, como se fossem minha própria família. Ryumi, a irmã que parece um menino, e Naori, a irmã otaku que é fofa por fora. E eu sou Jun Shirasaki, que não tem medo de ficar imprensada entre lindas irmãs com personalidades diferentes. Embora seja um novato apaixonado, não tenho um relacionamento especial e as mudanças continuam. "Por que você não sai comigo? Que tal tentarmos namorar?" Essas palavras de Ryumi eventualmente nos levaram a um estranho triângulo amoroso. A história da comédia romântica do primeiro amor com gêmeos começa!

title.en: Hanmen Kyoushi: Seito no Tame nara, Nandemo Yarimasu

altTitles.ja: 犯面教師～生徒のためなら、何でもヤリます～

altTitles.ja-ro: Hanmen Kyoushi ～Seito no Tame nara, Nandemo Yarimasu～

altTitles.en: Criminal Teacher ~I'll Do Anything for My Students~

description.en: "I'll do anything for the students." Beautiful teacher Mina was newly assigned to a problematic class where teacher bullying was rampant behind the scenes. The troublemakers quickly set their sights on Mina, but the students didn't know... she was a dedicated teacher who would go to extreme lengths for her students' sake. As Mina resolves various issues through unconventional methods, the students are taken aback, reconsider their actions, and gradually reform. Here emerges a true example of an unusual educator.
description.vi: "Vì học sinh, cô sẵn sàng làm bất kỳ chuyện gì" - Hakanai Mina. Và cô ấy thật sự làm đúng như những gì mình nói.

altTitles.th: เทพยุทธ์พลิกลิขิตสวรรค์

description.en:
In this world, respect is earned with martial arts. Weak martial artists have strengths of tens of thousands of pounds, capable of cracking boulders. And the strong ones can cut off rivers and split mountains. There are even martial kings who know everything and can travel across the universe. Martial art decides your fate as well as your life and death. The weak is humiliated while the strong looks down on the world. This is a a world where the strong bullies the weak. People's statuses are decided by the levels of their cultivation of martial arts. Each faction fights for the title of "The Strongest". Only the strong ones have the right to survive. Even if you are from the same clan or faction, if you are weak, then you will be bullied and kicked out without mercy.  
  
After a car accident, Lin Feng crosses over to this new world into the body of a young master from the powerful Lin Family.  
Will Lin Feng be used by others again or will he forge his own path in this place where, regardless of your family ties or sect, only the strong have the right to live.  


---
description.fr: Dans ce monde, le respect se gagne avec les arts martiaux. Les artistes martiaux faibles ont des forces de dizaines de milliers de pounds, capables de craquer des blocs rocheux. Et les plus forts peuvent couper les rivières et creuser des montagnes. Il y a même des rois martiaux qui savent tout et peuvent voyager à travers l'univers. L'art martial décide de votre destin ainsi que de votre vie et de votre mort. Les faibles sont humiliés tandis que les forts méprisent tout le monde. C'est un monde où les forts intimident les faibles. Les statuts des gens sont déterminés par les niveaux de culture des arts martiaux. Chaque faction se bat pour le titre du "plus fort". Seuls les forts ont le droit de survivre. Même si vous appartenez au même clan ou à la même faction, si vous êtes faible, alors vous serez persécuté et expulsé sans pitié.
description.pt-br: Neste mundo, o respeito é obtido através das artes marciais. A força de artistas marciais fracos é igual a dezenas de milhares de libras, capazes de quebrar rochas. E os fortes podem cortar rios e dividir montanhas. Há até reis marciais que conhecem tudo e podem viajar pelo universo. A arte marcial decide seu destino, bem como sua vida e sua morte. Os fracos são humilhados enquanto o olhar forte para o mundo. Este é um mundo onde os fortes intimidam os fracos. O status das pessoas é decidido pelos níveis de cultivo de artes marciais. Cada facção luta pelo título de "O mais poderoso". Apenas os fortes têm o direito de sobreviver. Mesmo se você é do mesmo clã ou facção, se você é fraco, então você será intimidado e expulso sem piedade.

description.en:
A world of constant war because we don't understand each other's differences.
A world where it is normal to hate and harm other species.
In this hellish world where blood is splashed and people kill and kill each other, how can a boy named Rito survive?
A medieval dark fantasy of humans and xenomorphs.
description.ko:
서로의 다름을 이해 못 해 끊임없는 전쟁이 벌어지는 세계.
타종을 혐오하고 해하는 것이 당연한 세계.
피가 튀고 서로가 죽고 죽이는
이 지옥 같은 세계에서 소년 '리토'는
과연 어떻게 살아남을 것인가.

인간과 이종족들이 벌이는 중세 다크 판타지

description.en:
After being aggressively rejected, Momo Ayase finds herself sulking when she stumbles across a boy being bullied. Saved by her rash kindness, the occult-obsessed boy attempts to speak to her about supernatural interests he believes they share. Rejecting his claims, Ayase proclaimed that she is instead a believer in ghosts, starting an argument between the two over which is real.

In a bet to determine who's correct, the two decide to separately visit locations associated with both the occult and the supernatural—Ayase visiting the former and the boy visiting the latter. When the two reach their respective places, it turns out that neither of them was wrong and that both the occult and ghosts do exist.

This marks the beginning of Ayase and the boy's adventure, who shares a name with Ayase's favorite idol—Ken Takakura, as they attempt to fix the surreal supernatural and sci-fi elements around them to return to a normal life.
description.fr:
Momo Ayase et Ken Takakura sont tous deux lycéens. Tandis que la première croit aux fantômes, le second est fasciné par les extraterrestres. Évidemment, chacun se moque des croyances de l’autre. Incapables de se convaincre, ils se lancent un défi pour savoir lequel des deux a raison. Momo se retrouve dans un hôpital où des créatures de l’espace sont censées se trouver et Ken dans un tunnel hanté. C’est le début d’une romance survoltée où l’occulte, le paranormal et le surnaturel se bousculent dans un chaos haletant !

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kazé / Crunchyroll**
description.ja: 幽霊肯定派の女子校生・綾瀬桃と、同級生の怪奇現象オタク・オカルト君。互いに否定するUFOと怪異を信じさせるため、桃はUFOスポットの病院廃墟へ、オカルト君は心霊スポットのトンネルへ行くのだが…。運命の恋が始まる!?
description.ru: Призраки, монстры, инопланетяне, подростковая романтика, сражения!.. В этой серии есть все! Такакура, одержимый оккультизмом, не верящий в призраков, и Аясэ, девушка, не верящая в пришельцев, пытаются преодолеть свои разногласия, когда сталкиваются с паранормальными явлениями! Эта манга - не от мира сего!
description.uk:
Чорти, чудовиська, позаземці, підлітковий роман, махачі та дідько б їх узяв… раковини! У цій манзі ви знайдете все!

Окультний фанбой Такакура, його подруга Аясе та їх надприродні пригоди у новій психоломній манзі!
description.pt-br: Takakura, um rapaz que é um fanático do ocultismo que não acredita em fantasmas, e Ayase, uma garota que não acredita em alienígenas, encontram uma estranheza esmagadora que transcende sua compreensão mútua…! Uma história de vinda oculta da idade!

title.en: I Need Someone to Stop My Older Brothers

altTitles.ko: 누가 우리 오빠들 좀 말려 주세요

description.en:
I only went to calm the disturbance in front of my house, but the one I encountered was the Demon King that I punished, and unfortunately, I was falsely accused of being the demon king and died in the hand of the subjugation team.

‘I’ll kick your ass, Pamel Asinov! I’ll make you shed tears from both of your eyes!’

Among them, the worst one was the hero, Pamel Asinov, who drove me to death as a Demon King!

But when I pleaded to take revenge, I opened my eyes, 500 years later! Pamel’s been dead for a long time, and the ‘brothers’ who came one day…

“Purple eyes. It’s not a color that anyone can have.”
“But I was like this from the beginning.”
“Yes, you were. Because you are the granddaughter of Archduke Asinov.”
“…the granddaughter of Archduke Asinov?”

Of all people, I’m the daughter of ‘that’ Asinov? It’s nice to live a peaceful life, but I was born an enemy’s blood!

‘All the brothers in this house have a habit of hugging people.’

This shitty family. I have to hate them, but why do I keep getting attached to them?

altTitles.ja: 星野ヒバナはみつかれる

description.en: The day after he finds himself dumped by his girlfriend, Sorayama Shun recieves a letter… from himself? The letter was from Shun 25 years ago for his future self. The letter reminds him of the time when he dreamed of owning a Countach and being a successful professional racer. With loads of luck and his ambition to make his childhood dream come true, he finds himself as a new owner of an LP400 Countach.

altTitles.ja: ヨシダ檸檬ドロップス

description.en:
A Kyoto University student who is afraid of students vs. the most famous female wrestler at Kyoto University!?

Kyoto University is a hotbed of supernatural abilities where geniuses and prodigies from all over the country gather.

After failing the entrance exam once, Yamakawa Kashio became a student at Kyoto University, but he lost his only unique ability to study better than others, and spent his days in fear and depression as a zero-person with no unique ability.

In front of Kashio appears Sawakita Yoko, a classmate who spent three years in the mandolin club with him in high school.

Yoko, who was a plain student like Kashio, enrolled at Kyoto University while still in high school, and made a name for herself as a female wrestler, becoming the most famous Kyoto University student ever!

Kashio is overwhelmed by Yoko, who has become a distant presence, but Yoko has been waiting for Kashio to come to Kyoto University for a long time――!?
The gong of a hot love that will heat up Kamogawa is about to ring out!!

title.en: The Prince Regent Is Yandere and Pampering

altTitles.zh: Shezheng Wang Shi Bing Jiao, Dechongzhe
Shèzhèng Wáng Shì Bìng Jiāo, Déchǒngzhe

description.en: The powerful and sickly Regent King x The strong and active spoiled daughter of the Prime Minister. Nan Xi was reborn after a tragic death at the hands of a scumbag and a bitch, and suddenly realized that she was blind in her previous life and chose fish eyes instead of pearls! The sickly Regent King treated her in every way and doted on her!

The underground speaks of hitman of incredible skill, this man goes by the name "Jesus." Why, you ask? because that happens to be last word to escape the lips of any fool unfortunate enough to be caught on the wrong end of his gun.


----

Indonesian release by Elex Media Komputindo as **J**

altTitles.ja: あそこではたらくムスブさん

altTitles.th: คุณมุสุบุกับงานของเธอ

description.en: Sagami Gorou works in sales at Shounan Rubber Industries Co., Ltd. He is secretly harboring feelings for Musubu, a girl working in the company's integrated development department. And what this lovely young scientist is researching day and night are actually…
description.es-la: La historia sigue a Sagami Gouro de 24 años que empieza a trabajar en Industria Shounan Gum S.A, allí conocerá a la investigadora Musubu-san una chica que trabaja en el laboratorio de desarrollo de asistencia médica la "casa", su primer encuentro no será precisamente el esperado.
description.pt-br: Sagami Gorou trabalha no setor de vendas da Indústria de Borracha Shounan Ltda e tem guardado seus sentimentos por Musubu, uma garota que trabalha no departamento de desenvolvimento integrado, em segredo. O objeto de estudo desta adorável cientista, na verdade é…

title.en: Tensei Dai Majo no Isekai Kurashi - Kodai Roman-Fuu Kokka de Hajimeru Mahou Kenkyuu

altTitles.ja: 転生大魔女の異世界暮らし～古代ローマ風国家で始める魔法研究～

altTitles.en: The Otherworldly Life of a Reincarnated Great Witch - Magical Research Begun in an Ancient Roman-Style Nation

description.en:
"I want to be the wizard of my dreams!”

Zenith, a young girl reincarnated in the ancient Roman-style country of Jupiter, goes to study in the capital with only her momentum.

She spreads water magic and floods the classroom. She even falls unconscious after using herself as a test subject, and shoots hot air out of her buttocks in an experiment, and her outlandish behavior never stops.

Despite the white eyes of the people around her, she sells shaved ice using ice magic to earn money for her research, and it accidentally becomes a big hit...?

"Amazing! I've made the discovery of the century again!”

Sometimes a catastrophe, sometimes a success(?), sometimes a laugh-out-loud moment! 

A Roman comical fantasy of a research-loving girl sparking a magical revolution begins!
description.ja:
「憧れの魔法使いになりたい！」


古代ローマ風の国「ユピテル」に転生した少女ゼニスは、勢いだけで首都へと留学する。


水魔法を撒き散らして、教室を水浸しに。自分を実験体にしたあげくに昏倒、実験でお尻から熱風をぶっ放す、とその規格外な行動は止まらない。

白い目を向ける周囲をよそに、研究資金稼ぎに氷魔法で「かき氷」を売り出したら、うっかり大ヒットしてしまい……!?

「ひょぇえ！　私、また世紀の大発見をしてしまいました！」

時に大惨事、時に大成功（？）、時に大爆笑！

研究ラブな少女が魔法革命を巻き起こす、ローマン・コミカルファンタジー開幕！

altTitles.ja: ミミクリー・ガールズ

description.en:
The year is 2041. It has been several years since the development of Artificial Body technology, commonly known as "Mimic." Captain Chris Armstrong, after suffering a serious injury from an unexpected incident during a military operation, undergoes mimic surgery and returns to the frontlines... or at least, that was the plan. After the surgery, there was something strange about his body.
His reflection that he saw in the mirror had soft white skin, complimented by silky hair——it was a beautiful girl!?!!?

Amidst the flames of war writhing with conspiracy and resentment, a makeshift team of four girl-type mimics was formed.
Their name: Mimicry Girls.

Shooting, CQC, infiltration. A mission was given to these girls that were specialists in all fields. That is, to escort the president's daughter from the international criminal organization "Val Verde" that is out for her life.

After a cool tea party is the start of a cute operation!
Taking on the form of girls, they face off against the world's greatest evils!
An exhilarating gun-slinging comedy, presented by a four "girl" special forces team!

altTitles.en: A Rough Lady is All Bothered

altTitles.ja: あらくれお嬢様はもんもんしている

altTitles.vi: Nàng Tiểu Thư Cộc Cằn Lại Lỡ Một Nhịp Rồi?!

description.en:
Meet Tsubaki Kuchinashi, the Manhater Prince. Beautiful and popular, Tsubaki's core strength in high school comes from her position as the principal's granddaughter - suffice it to say, but any student or teacher who even looks at her the wrong way could be expelled at a moment's notice.   
  
Meet Tadashi Kiritsu, the head of the Public Morals Committee. As sharp and rigid as his glasses, Tadashi despises Kuchinashi's iron grip on the school. Naturally, a challenge to her rule bothers Kuchinashi, so she decides to get rid of him as soon as possible. Her plan? Get him in a honey trap. However, that's easier said than done, as she starts finding hidden aspects of herself that she didn't want to acknowledge, either to herself or to Tadashi.  
  
Will she prevail before her conscience eats her up from her own salacious taunts? Will Tadashi play into her hands? What manner of a person will he prove himself to be when facing her taunts?
description.ja: 私ばっかりもんもんするのは絶対おかしい‥‥。目障りな風紀委員・起立匡史(きりつただし)を退学させるため、口無椿(くちなしつばき)お嬢様はご自分のお色気でヤツを陥れることに。ですが、ナイスバディなお嬢様のお色気が起立に全く効きません。逆に、椿様の方がもんもんしてしまうのです。
description.vi:
Xin giới thiệu Tsubaki Kuchinashi: nàng hoàng tử "hận đàn ong," cháu gái của hiệu trưởng trường cao trung nơi chụy đang học. Vì thế, Tsubaki vừa có tiền, vừa có quyền, lại được xã hội (trong trường) trọng vọng (và tất nhiên là xinh đẹp nữa rồi). Ai dám động thủ với chị ấy (học sinh hay giáo viên) thì sẽ được cho đi T**** H** ngay tắp lự.

Phía bên kia có Tadashi Kiritsu: Cầm đầu ủy ban kỉ luật của trường, thanh niên nghiêm túc dốc hết công sức mình cho công cuộc trị an ở trường. Cũng vì thế mà Tsubaki mới thấy anh này "ngứa mắt" kinh khủng và muốn cho anh này bị đuổi học cho nhẹ nợ.

Vậy làm sao để có thể đuổi học được nam chính của chúng ta? Tsubaki cứ nghĩ là làm tí "mật ngọt chết ruồi" để nhử Tadashi vào bẫy là sẽ chắc kèo thắng. Nhưng người tính đâu bằng trời tính, qua những cái bẫy này, nữ chính của ta lại dần dà khám phá ra được những khía cạnh mới của bản thân mình và Tadashi mà chị ấy khó lòng chấp nhận được...

Rồi Tsubaki sẽ cắn rứt lương tâm trước vì những trò chơi khăm của mình hay là Tadashi sẽ mắc vào bẫy trước đây?

altTitles.en: I show my true colors shining through.
There Are Clothes I Want to Wear

description.en:
University student Mami is seen by everyone as the fashionable cool model-type but she secretly just wants to wear Lolita fashion.  
  
While she tries occasionally to be more cute & less "stylish", she can't overcome the image others have of her. When she watches a new coworker at the cafe she works part-time at leave in a extremely flashy outfit, it sparks the courage in her to express herself more truthfully too!

altTitles.ja: ヤンデレっぽい女の子が握ったおにぎり

description.en: A girl who only at first glance resembles yandere.
description.ru: Девушка, только с первого взгляда напоминающая яндере.

altTitles.ja: 学園アイドルマスター GOLD RUSH

description.en: The story of girls who attend a school where dreams come true!

title.en: Soredemo Shutter no Oto wa Naru

altTitles.ja: それでもシャッターの音は鳴る

altTitles.ja-ro: Sore demo Shutter no Oto wa Naru

altTitles.en: Even So, the Shutter Will Keep On Clicking

description.en:
Hino is a perfectionist photographer. Because of his strictness, his assistant cameraman quit today. As an awkward atmosphere prevails at the site, a young man, Mitsuo, suddenly appears and says, “I'd like to be your assistant.” Inspired by his free-spirited and carefree personality, Hino gradually became more comfortable around him. But just when things are starting to go well at work, he discovers Mitsuo's secret...?

“Do you love photography?”

Even though they don’t want it, and even though they hate it, they still keep clicking the shutter in search of an answer.

The main character is a detective, Kazuhiko Amamiya, suffering from Multiple Personality Disorder (a.k.a. Dissociative Identity Disorder). Starting out as a violent detective series with a twist (the twist being the variant personalities that take over Detective Amamiya at various intervals), the series evolves into an exceptionally complex and involved sci-fi conspiracy story.

title.en: Kusuriya no Hitorigoto ~Maomao no Koukyuu Nazotoki Techou~

altTitles.en: The Apothecary Diaries: Maomao's Rear Palace Mysteries Journal
The Apothecary Diaries: Maomao's Rear Palace Notebook of Mysteries

altTitles.ru: Монолог в аптечной лавке - Журнал тайн внутреннего дворца Маомао

altTitles.ja: 薬屋のひとりごと～猫猫の後宮謎解き手帳～

description.en:
In the imperial court, a young woman is put into servitude, Maomao. The tale is just beginning for the woman doctor/pharmacist from the red-light district, as rumors circulate about the emperor's children's lives being short-lived. Her curious nature and thirst for knowledge pushes her to action. To satisfy her curiosity, this young doctor/pharmacist will investigate the origin! What is shifting in the imperial court..!?  
  


---
description.ja: 誘拐された挙句、とある大国の後宮に売り飛ばされた薬屋の少女・猫猫（マオマオ）。年季が明けるまで大人しくしようと決めていた猫猫だったが、あるとき皇帝の子どもたちが次々と不審死することを知る。好奇心と少しばかりの正義心、そして薬屋の知識を使い、その謎を調べ始めてから猫猫の運命は大きく変わって…？
description.ru: В императорский двор была доставлена молодая девушка Маомао. История её берёт начало в районе красных фонарей, где начали ходить слухи о том, что жизни детей императора под угрозой. Ею движут любопытство и жажда знаний. Чтобы удовлетворить своё любопытство, молодая целительница будет докапываться до истины! Что же изменится при императорском дворе?!
description.pt-br: Na corte imperial, uma jovem é colocada em servidão, Maomao. A história está apenas começando para a médica/apotecária do distrito da luz vermelha, enquanto circulam rumores de que a vida dos filhos do imperador foi de curta duração. Sua natureza curiosa e sede de conhecimento a levam à ação. Para satisfazer a sua curiosidade, esta jovem médica/apotecária irá investigar a origem! O que está mudando na corte imperial..!?

description.en:
The story revolves around high school student Neji Yamato, who has worries that keep resurfacing. He keeps asking himself, "Just who am 'I,' who is nothing at all?"

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **The Screw People** (2019)

Millions of years have passed since the times of legends, when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world. It is the era of the 500 year war: The warring states period. Kingdom is the story of a young boy named Shin who grew into a great general and all the trials and bloodshed that lead him there.  

---
  
- **Won the Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2013**
- **Earned a Guinness World Record on December 12, 2012 for Manga written by the most people. -Note- The record was due to its "Social Kingdom" campaign in which fans and other artists were given the task of redrawing the entire 26th volume.**

As of June 2022, Kingdom has over 90 million copies in circulation, making it one of the currently best-selling manga series of all time. 

Parution: Weekly Young Jump

---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Meian](https://www.meian-editions.fr/meian/licence/kingdom/1131)  
- In Italian by [J-pop](https://j-pop.it/it/fumetti/manga/kingdom.html)
description.fr:
**Cette Histoire se déroule avant notre ère.**

La chine, qui n'est pas encore unifiée, traverse une grande guerre de cinq siècles. Shin, un jeune garçon contemporain de ces temps violents et houleux, cherche, par la seule force de son épée, à se faire un nom sous les cieux !!!
___
**Kingdom en France, le manga tant attendu ! Véritable phénomène au Japon !**
- Élu meilleur manga au 17e Grand Prix Culturel Osamu Tezuka (2013)
- Meilleur manga seinen vendu au Japon depuis 2015 (source : Oricon)
- 3ème meilleur manga vendu au Japon en 2016 et 2017 (source : Oricon)
description.uk: Мільйони років минуло з часів легенд, коли світ людей і богів був єдиним. У ті часи бажання людини верховодило над світом. Це була епоха 500-річної війни, період ворожих держав. «Королівство» — історія про хлопчину на ім’я Сінь, котрий прагне стати найвеличнішим генералом та про безліч випробувань та скитань, повз які пролягатиме його шлях до мети.
description.pt-br: Milhões de anos se passaram desde os tempos de lendas, quando os mundos dos homens e deuses ainda eram os mesmos. Nestes tempos eram os desejos do homem que mudaram o mundo. É o período da guerra de 500 anos: a Era dos Reinos Combatentes. Kingdom é a história de um garoto órfão e pobre tem o sonho de se tornar um grande general e assim começando seu caminho de provações e derramamento de sangue que o levarão até o topo das lendas!

description.de:
Da geht irgendwas sehr seltsames in der Nachbarschaft vor sich.  
Ja wen wirst du Bescheid sage? Wen willst du zur Hilfe holen? Ähm… irgendein komisches… Mädchen was von sich behauptet, hypnotische Kräfte zu besitzen? Ach so, ja, genau das.  
Jedoch hast du absolut keine Ahnung wo sie ist, und du hast ihr auch nicht Bescheid gegeben.  
Was wird nun aus dir werden, da er da ist…?
description.en:
There's something strange, in the neighborhood.  
Who you gonna call? Uhm. Some strange cute hypnotist girl.  
And you have no clue who she is, and you didn't call her.  
  


---
description.ru:
Каково это, когда привычный мир рушится в одночасье? Кто друг, а кто враг?
Можно ли доверять себе, когда сам теряешься в круговороте пугающих и необъяснимых событий? А может быть, ты сам и есть их источник?
Главный герой — обычный корейский парень, живущий с пожилой матерью в крохотной квартирке, обнаружил, что люди вокруг внезапно изменились. Некие зловещие существа без лишнего шума захватили целый город, а, возможно, даже страну или мир. Но главный герой не собирается сидеть сложа руки и, объединившись с загадочной гипнотизёршей, решает дать отпор неведомым тварям.

title.en: Hana wa Saku, Shura no Gotoku

altTitles.es-la: Las flores florecen, tal como Asura

description.en:
Hana, who lives on Tonaki Island, a small island with a population of 600, loves reciting so much that she holds public reading sessions for the children of the island. Mizuki feels that Hana's "reading" has the power to attract people, and invites her to join the broadcasting club, of which she is the head.

"Tell me your true wish and I'll make it come true."
"I want to join the broadcasting club."

Hana decides to join the club, and has many "firsts" with the members of the broadcasting club, deepening her love of reciting...
description.ja:
人口600人の小さな島・十鳴島に住む花奈は、島の子供たちに向けて朗読会を行うほど朗読が好きだった。花奈の〝読み〟に人を惹きつける力を感じた瑞希は、自身が部長を務める放送部へ誘う。

「お前の本当の願いを言え、アタシが叶えてやる」
「私、放送部に入りたいです」

入部を決意した花奈は、たくさんの〝初めて〟を放送部のメンバーと共にし、大好きな朗読を深めていく…。
description.th:
ฮานะอาศัยอยู่บนเกาะโทนาคิ เกาะเล็ก ๆ ที่มีประชากรเพียง 600 คน ซึ่งไม่มีคนที่อายุรุ่นราวคราวเดียวกันกับฮานะอยู่เลย เธอผู้ชื่นชอบการอ่านออกเสียง ได้จัดงานอ่านออกเสียงให้เด็ก ๆ บนเกาะฟังมาตั้งแต่สมัยยังอยู่ ป.4 ทำให้เธอเป็นขวัญใจของเด็ก ๆ
ต่อมาในวันก่อนที่เธอจะขึ้นม.ปลายหนึ่งวัน ก็ได้พบกับอุซุรากิ มิซุกิ รุ่นพี่ชมรมกระจายเสียงในโรงเรียนม.ปลาย สุโมโมะกาโอกะ ที่เธอกำลังจะไปเข้าเรียน...
และนั่นก็คือก้าวแรกสู่การเปลี่ยนแปลงของฮานะ

altTitles.ja: ワイルドストロベリー

description.en: Plants have evolved. They can now feed on humans and become terrible monsters known as Jinka. Kingo and Kayano do their best to survive in a Tokyo overrun by plants, but when Kayano becomes a Jinka, Kingo will do anything he can to get her back!

altTitles.en: Tougen Anki: Legend of the Cursed Blood

altTitles.fr: Tôgen Anki : La légende du sang maudit

description.en: Ichinose Shiki, an inheritor of the blood of Oni had lived out his entire childhood oblivious to this fact. However, when an unknown man comes rushing into his home in attempts to assassinate him, his foster father finally reveals the truth. In a world where Oni and Momotarou have never been able to coexist, join Ichinose in his struggle for power and unifying the two races!
description.fr:
Une légende raconte qu'un enfant extrêmement fort serait né d'une pêche et baptisé Momotarô. Lorsqu'il devint assez grand et puissant, ce valeureux guerrier aurait chassé les Oni qui pillaient les villages. Ce héros n'est pas une légende... Tout comme les Oni...
Leurs descendants sont encore parmi nous et la bataille opposait le clan Momotarô au clan des Oni fait rage ! Shiki est un jeune garçon, au sang chaud. Alors qu'il vient de se faire renvoyer de l'école, il prend conscience qu'il possède du sang de Oni. Le clan Momotarô le cherche et veut l'éliminer. la quête de liberté de Shiki et des autres Oni commence...
description.pt-br: Ichinose Shiki, um herdeiro do sangue de Oni, viveu toda a sua infância alheio a esse fato. No entanto, quando um homem desconhecido entra correndo em sua casa na tentativa de assassiná-lo, seu pai adotivo finalmente revela a verdade. Em um mundo onde Oni e Momotarou nunca puderam coexistir, junte-se a Ichinose em sua luta pelo poder e unificando as duas raças!

altTitles.ja: 異世界のんびり素材採取生活

altTitles.en: Living a Carefree Life Collecting Raw Materials in Another World

description.en:
Sozai Shuu, a working adult with a slightly weird habit of loving to collect raw materials, was transferred to another world by God after losing his life.

In order to live leisurely, Shuu wished for 『a power to live a carefree life collecting raw materials in another world.』His wish was successfully granted however, his magic power is strangely enormous, and his skill is really convenient? Seems like God misunderstood that he wanted to harvest materials from monsters leisurely so the power he gave Shuu was so incredible….

Nevertheless, Shuu does not take it to mind and freely uses his unique skill 【Detect】 in another world to search for materials, harvest them, eat them, make money off of them and lives a carefree life collecting materials.

Kasane Hayafuji's secret joy in life is seeing Aoyama-san, a waitress at a family restaurant. One night, she saw Aoyama standing alone in the rain. When she tried to help, Aoyama suddenly made her an offer.

"Will you be my big sister?"

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Nico Nico Seiga](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/59079)
description.id:
Menemui Aoyama-san yang bekerja sebagai pelayan di restoran keluarga merupakan arti kehidupan Hayafuji Kasane. Pada suatu hari, Kasane memutuskan membantu Aoyama-san yang tengah berdiam diri di tengah guyuran hujan. Kemudian, Aoyama-san tiba-tiba menawari Kasane perjanjian saudari.

“Bersediakah kamu… menjadi kakakku?”

altTitles.ja: アパートメント四階建

description.en:
Aki, who has lived life in easy mode.  When he went on a trip to Finland where he rented an apartment, he met Mika, a handsome man from Northern Europe, and got drunk and H... lost his virginity! !

He thought they would never see each other again, but Mika ended up staying at Aki's share house "Apartment 4-story"! ?

While he was sleeping, he was bullied, pressured, and talked about as a lover.  In addition, the residents of the share house, Kujou (Aki's friends) and Mosao (the plain bullied child) are also involved! ?

A time when the boundary between human and demon was vague. Ten sacred items – “Jingi” had been stolen from Mikado’s Treasury by some demons. An imperial order to recover the Jingi was given to all the Onmyōji in the capital, including “the heretic” – Fuzuki. He sets out to retrieve the first Jingi, but something unthinkable happened…

altTitles.fr: La fille qui découvre le rock !

description.en:
With a passion for richly textured Japanese rock, first-year high school student Chihiro Hatono steps into the world of the light music club, new guitar in tow. But what awaits her behind those doors...? A drama of unfiltered youth and musical ambition takes the stage!
___
[Defunct Official English (MANGA Plus)](https://mangaplus.shueisha.co.jp/titles/100291)
description.es-la: Chihiro Hatono, estudiante de primer año de preparatoria y apasionada por el rock japonés se adentra en el mundo del club de música ligera con una nueva guitarra a cuestas. Pero, ¿qué le espera tras esas puertas...? ¡Un drama sobre juventud sin filtros y ambición musical toma el escenario!
description.pt-br: Com uma paixão pelo rock japonês ricamente texturizado, a estudante do primeiro ano do ensino médio Chihiro Hatono entra no mundo do clube de música leve, com uma nova guitarra em mãos. Mas o que a espera atrás daquelas portas...? Um drama de juventude não filtrada e ambição musical sobe ao palco!

description.en: Ye Ji-an, the only S-class guide in Korea, was often called the “useless guide” due to her unique trait of having a 0% matching rate with all espers. After failing to match with an esper from Russia and on her way back home, she is suddenly swept away by a gate manifestation and wakes up alone in a strange temple-like place. The world she has traveled to through the gate is the continent of Wisrode, filled only with espers, and in this place, Ji-an is the only guide…

The hilarious misadventures of the "Sket Dan"; a group of high-schoolers who help out people as part of their club activity. Himeko, the hot-headed ex-delinquent with a soft spot for cute things and a taste for strange food. Switch, the brainy otaku who only talks via a computerized speech-application. And Bossun, the atypical leader of this looney bunch, with the amazing power to… concentrate very hard!

- Won the 55th annual Shogakukan Manga Award in 2009 for best shounen manga.  


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media Komputindo as **SKET DANCE** (2015)

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/kentashinohara_)  
- [Anime on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=12089)
description.ru:
"Скет Данс" - школьный клуб, чья деятельность весьма необычна - помогать в решении абсолютно любых проблем, которые возникли у учеников или даже учителей. А члены этого чудо-клуба, не менее странные личности, чем сам клуб: Боссун - гений дедуктивного мышления, Химэко - боевая единица группы и Свич - "мозг" и хакер мира сего. Вы всегда можете к ним обратиться, если осмелитесь…  
  
- Won the 55th annual Shogakukan Manga Award in 2009 for best shounen manga.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/kentashinohara_)  
- [Anime on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=12089)

description.en:
In this seemingly peaceful country, there lives a hitman that hunts down others of his kind - an assassin of assassins. Before eliminating his targets, he always questions their motives for killing - this is his way of embracing his destiny.

 From the author of "Until Your Bones Rot" and "The Shadows of Who We Once Were," Utsumi Yae presents a thrilling drama about the lives of those existing on the edge between life and death.

title.en: The Lady Knight and the Beast-Eared Child

altTitles.ja: 女騎士とケモミミの子

altTitles.ja-ro: Onna Kishi to Kemomimi no Ko

altTitles.ja: Female knight and the Kemonomimi child

altTitles.en: Female Knight and the Kemonomimi Child
The Female Knight and the Beast-Eared Child

description.en: A different world where demons are rampant and murderous. Olivia, a female knight, lives with her apprentice Noah, an animal eared child. A tale of a master and apprentice growing up, adventuring and being healed by the strong bond between each other.
description.ja: 魔物が蔓延り殺伐とした異世界。女騎士オリビアは、弟子の獣人ノアと暮らしていた。強く生きる2人の絆に癒され、キュンとする師弟の成長冒険譚。

description.en: In a world where humans are protected by the Chimera tribe as an endangered species. As he spends time with a human girl, a certain emotion begins to grow in the heart of a Chimera boy.....!

She was just my classmate until yesterday but now she's my cute girlfriend☆! But everyday is nerve racking with her almost identical twin brother around. This is the popular three man fluff + meddling brother romantic comedy!

Around the offices of Tozai News, Shiro Yamaoka has a reputation for being over-blunt, under-ambitious, and generally an all-around slacker. So why has he been given the important job of coming up with the "Ultimate Menu" to celebrate the newspaper's 100th anniversary? Because he possesses qualities his other colleagues don't: an exquisitely discerning palate, an encyclopedic knowledge of food and drink, and a masterful touch in the kitchen.

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Seinen/General in 1987**
